title: Actor Michael Emerson Interview - Person of Interest & Lost
author: CatchWitt
comment: Nice interview.  I'm looking forward to seeing how the final series plays out - though Iwill miss it when it ends. There's been talk about it possibly being rebooted through Netflix or Amazon - I wonder if the main cast and writers would be up for that if it was picked up? Or would it have to be a totally fresh start with different characters taking up the fight?
I can tell he's really bugg'd out in real life like the characters he plays. He plays them too well
He kinda talks like Terrence McKenna
WHAT A TERRIBLE sound recording :o I hope its not with the interview technics!!!
description: Michael Emerson takes questions and discusses Person of Interest, Lost and current plans. Great interview.
